title: XPO Inc Stock Market Capitalization and Valuation Metrics

content.text: As of the current date, XPO Inc has a market capitalization of $X. This places it within the range of the industry average for market capitalization. The company's market capitalization indicates its total value as determined by the stock market.
Various valuation ratios can provide insights into XPO Inc's valuation compared to industry benchmarks. The commonly used ratios include:

The P/E ratio for XPO Inc is currently X, which indicates that the market values the company at X times its earnings. This ratio can be compared to the industry average P/E ratio to assess XPO Inc's relative valuation.

The P/S ratio for XPO Inc is X, suggesting that investors are willing to pay X times the company's annual sales. Comparing this ratio to industry benchmarks provides insights into XPO Inc's valuation relative to its peers.

XPO Inc's P/B ratio is X, which compares the market price per share to the company's book value per share. This ratio allows investors to assess whether the stock is overvalued or undervalued compared to its accounting value.
XPO Inc does not currently offer a dividend, so its dividend yield is X%. This ratio can be compared to the average dividend yield of comparable companies in the industry.
The EV/EBITDA ratio for XPO Inc is X, indicating the market's valuation of the company's enterprise value relative to its EBITDA. This ratio is commonly used to compare companies within the industry.

news.headline: XPO Schedules Third Quarter 2023 Earnings Conference Call for Monday, October 30, 2023
news.summary: GREENWICH, Conn. , Sept. 29, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- XPO (NYSE: XPO) will hold its third quarter conference call and webcast on Monday, October 30, at 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time.
